name: Alyx - Half Life - Character LORA
description:
Trained on NAI with 44 pictures. Versatile lora (anime to realistic).
Best result with weight between : 0.8-1.
Prompt activator : alyxvance
Other prompts : dark skin, tan skin, belt, brown hair, denim, fingerless gloves, gloves, hood, hoodie, jacket, jeans, necklace

You can remove the hoodie from the jacket. "hoodie" in negative.

Commissioned by justinsluka on fiverr

Reviews are really appreciated, i love to see the community use my work, that's why I share it.
If you like my work, you can tip me here.

Got a specific request ? I'm open for commission on my fiverr gig *! If you provide enough data, OCs are accepted

*Any paid request will not be presented on this page, unless you give me permission to.
